text: Agar tum dono Allah se tauba karti ho (to yeh tumhare liye behtar hai) kyunke tumhare dil seedhi raah se hath gaye hain, aur agar Nabi ke muqable mein tumne baham jattah-bandi ki (support one another) to jaan rakkho ke Allah uska maula(Protector) hai aur uske baad Jibrael aur tammam saaleh ehle iman aur sab malaika uske saathi aur madadgaar hai
